content.raw:
A couple of extra clock publishers:

* The `ros1_ign` bridge is bidirectional, so it creates a clock publisher from ROS back to Ign. I don't think anything is publishing clock in the ROS side though.
* Enabling log record seems to add another clock publisher (i.e. `ign gazebo --record` , then check `ign topic -i -t /world/default/clock`). I'm looking into this.
content.html:
A couple of extra clock publishers:

  • The ros1_ign bridge is bidirectional, so it creates a clock publisher from ROS back to Ign. I don't think anything is publishing clock in the ROS side though.
  • Enabling log record seems to add another clock publisher (i.e. ign gazebo --record , then check ign topic -i -t /world/default/clock). I'm looking into this.
